name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Knoema
description: This is a repository of knoema APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Knoema
apis.description: Knoema is the free to use public and open data platform for users with interests in statistics and data analysis, visual storytelling and making infographics and data-driven presentations
